channel.title: Domain + Server
channel.description: I bought a domain the other day (Runeiverse.net) I looked at the tuts for having a server, i have the No-IP DUC thing working but its to runeiverse.no-ip.org how can i change that? and how can i add forums to my website w/o doing all of that hard PHP code? for now i just want a simple forum, and a DL ling to my RSPS. can someone help? also i portforwarded but how can i verify that it worked?

item.title: Domain + Server
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

[quote=“nsfpure, post:6, topic:404834”][quote author=Brandontan link=topic=501842.msg3675761#msg3675761 date=1311234179]
thats pretty legit. do you think you can help me with mine a little bit? like i need help with webclient and a forum. the rest i can do. but i need you to show me how to do webclient as when i update it i’ll have to do it by myself. think you can help?
[/quote] yeah sure, what client do you use?[/quote]
umm dont get mad lol PI

Read full topic

item.title: Domain + Server
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

Weebly is a free online web builder. Actually, they might let you import your domain and allow you to use their builder which has no html or css involved. I don’t recommend this as you can make a better website with the coding . Check out mine (no advertising intended) http://deadscape.info/
Nsf

Read full topic

item.title: Domain + Server
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

[quote=“nsfpure, post:2, topic:404834”]First of all. Keep the no IP host. There’s no point in trying to change it. Secondly, you should have used a free web provider such as webs or weebly if you don’t know html and css because you can’t really do anything on a website without them. And lastly, you should use http://canyouseeme.org to check if your port is opened

Nsf[/quote]

can you clarify on weebly? or can you help out on teamviewer?

Read full topic

item.title: Domain + Server
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

First of all. Keep the no IP host. There’s no point in trying to change it. Secondly, you should have used a free web provider such as webs or weebly if you don’t know html and css because you can’t really do anything on a website without them. And lastly, you should use http://canyouseeme.org to check if your port is opened

Nsf

Read full topic

I bought a domain the other day (Runeiverse.net)
I looked at the tuts for having a server, i have the No-IP DUC thing working but its to runeiverse.no-ip.org
how can i change that?
and how can i add forums to my website w/o doing all of that hard PHP code?
for now i just want a simple forum, and a DL ling to my RSPS. can someone help?
also i portforwarded but how can i verify that it worked?
